our experiments.from sentence: We run our experiments on a machine that contains a single GTX 1080 GPU with 8 GB VRAM .

variable character embedding.from sentence: As introduced in Section 2 , we use a variable character embedding with a fixed pre-trained word embedding to serve as part of the input into the model .

character embedding.from sentence: The character embedding is implemented using CNN with a one -dimensional layer consists of 100 units with a channel size of 5 .

input depth.from sentence: It has an input depth of 8 .

max length.from sentence: The max length of SQuAD is 16 which means there are a maximum 16 words in a sentence .

fixed word embedding.from sentence: The fixed word embedding has a dimension of 100 , which is provided by the GloVe data set .

POS model.from sentence: The POS model contains syntactic information with 39 different POS tags that serve as both input and output .

input.from sentence: For SECT and SEDT the input of the model has a size of 8 with 30 units to be output .

maximum length size.from sentence: Both of them has a maximum length size that is set to be 10 and 20 respectively , which values will be further discussed in Section 4.5 .
